pages.title: Javan Rhino
pages.text: Its horn is usually shorter than 25 cm ($(o)9.8 in$()), and is smaller than those of the other rhino species.$(br2)Only adult bulls have horns; cows lack them altogether.

pages.title: Javan Rhino
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Randomly active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:melon_slice$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
